divs: Sighting DetailsDriving home from movie, saw amber coloured star, I pointed it out to my mom and she said "that dosent look like a normal star" it moved to the left and we turned down a road to follow it, I got out my camera and recorded it slowly ascending untill it dissapeared. I later deleted the footage after waking up in the middle of the night terrified, I regret deleting it.
trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Olathe
There were no other sightings in Olathe on or around January 1st 2012
